ai-dynamo/dynamo

serving and scaling generative AI models across distributed GPUs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Toolkit for distributed training and inference of large AI models using parallelism and memory management techniques
  • Notebooks and code samples for building generative AI apps on Google Cloud
  • database for AI data, vectors, and deep learning workflows
  • open-source GPU cluster manager for AI models
  • runs multiple AI agents in parallel, they share updates and refine each other’s work until reaching consensus
  • build modular AI pipelines with async processing and Gemini API integration
  • experimental Python framework for lightweight multi-agent AI orchestration
  • Python library for Google’s Gemini AI models
  • Multi-provider generative AI library for Rust
  • open-source platform for building and managing AI agents with multi-model integration
